items.name: A Three Sided Strawberry
items.desc:
After 21 months in red wine barrels, this funky pale was refermented on strawberries. This beer is one of three fruit expressions that share the same base beer.
Best paired with a meditation on the travails of the farm workers that hand harvest these delicate fruits.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
6.8% ABV 375ml
Store Cold
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Betty
items.desc:
A collaboration with Wild Card Brewery, this IPA features an innovative new hop blend from New Zealand, designed to present new aromas and flavours while showcasing the unique character of the country’s hops.
This collaboration was inspired by the impact Jaega, Wild Card’s Head Brewer, had on the attendees of Women On Tap festival, and has on the world through her wider community engagement work too - representation matters!
6% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Black Is Beautiful
items.desc:
Spiced Imperial Stout made in collaboration with Rock Leopard.
This Imperial Stout is our contribution to the Black Is Beautiful initiative hosted by Weathered Souls Brewing Co and has been brewed with our friends from Rock Leopard.
It's built on the rich, decadent base from My Continuous Improvement with a complex spice profile that includes African cinchona bark, orange peel, cloves, cinnamon sticks, dandelion root, kaffir lime leaves, cardamom pods, tonka beans, birch leaves, star anise and caraway seeds.
The Black is Beautiful initiative is a collaborative effort amongst the brewing community and its customers, in an attempt to bring awareness to the injustices that many people of colour face daily. Its mission is to bridge the gap that's been around for ages and provide a platform to show that the brewing community is an inclusive place for everyone of any colour.
100% of all proceeds (not just profits) from this beer have been donated to three organisations fighting the injustices, crimes, hostility and brutality facing Black people in our country. These organisations are Kids Of Colour, Rainbow Noir, and The Racial Justice Network.
Due to this, this beer is not applicable for any discounts or promotional campaigns we are currently running on our website (this includes the NHS and Key Worker discounts).
11% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: DDH Pale
items.desc:
Our Double Dry Hopped Pale is brewed to soup up your downtime by delivering the hop flavour intensity of our DIPAs at a moderate ABV. Doubling our standard Pale Ale's 8g/L dry-hopping rate to 16g/L delivers a bold, juicy, hazy, and intensely aromatic beer. Out of our hoppy beer range, this sets the marker for balance between drinkability and flavour impact.
5% ABV 440ML
Aroma & Flavour: Juicy tangerine and zesty grapefruit, soft white peach and resinous hop notes
Body: Medium-bodied and velvety with soft carbonation
Aftertaste: Lingering juicy orange and peach with a light, peppery bitterness
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
Want a discounted 6 pack? Click here

items.name: Dank Goth For The Weekend
items.desc:
Our Double Hopfenweisse offers up rich banana and clove esters from the yeast, to which we have added a potent mix of the dankest Crop Year 2019 hops for a powerful, aromatic sensory experience.
8.5% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Festbier w/ Beer Kulture
items.desc:
This traditional decoction mashed Festbier was brewed in collaboration with Beer Kulture, using an heirloom lager malt.
As we celebrate the traditions that came before us, we also celebrate the new traditions that we will create together as a community.
5.8% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Hoppy Little Lager
items.desc:
Our most approachable and easy-drinking beer takes cues from both our Pale Ale and our Light Lager, to combine bright, zesty, fruity hop flavours with the light drinkability and refreshing qualities of low-ABV lager. A fine thirst-quencher, a delicious pause between stronger beers, or a great choice if you're watching your alcohol or calorie intake.
3% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Bright, fresh lemon notes leading to mild candied fruit sweetness and juicy grapefruit
Body: Light-bodied, crisp and dry
Aftertaste: Lemon and grapefruit zest intertwined with light, resinous hop notes
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
Want a discounted 6 pack? Click here

items.name: In 2, 3. Out, 2, 3.
items.summary: Blended Wild Ale w/ Elderberry & Chuckleberry
items.desc:
Furthering our exploration of the British chuckleberry, this is a blend of a Bretted red wine Pale, refermented on elderberry, and a two-year-old spontaneous beer macerated on whole chuckleberries.
Breathe in, 2, 3. And out, 2, 3.
And in…
and out…
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
7% ABV, 750ml bottle

items.name: La Deuxième Saison Des Poires
items.desc:
Brewed with our friends from After The Harvest and Oliver's, this beer-perry hybrid is crisp, vibrant and thirst-quenching, finding harmony between classic perry flavours, yeast aromatics and hop notes. It was created by blending beer wort with pear juice and fermenting with a Saison yeast, before ageing in foudre for 10 months. A light Simcoe dry hop was then added prior to bottling.
ALC 5.4% VOL 750ML
Aroma & Flavour: Sweet pineapple and fresh green pear, accompanied by light lemony sourness and underpinned by light cereal malt character
Body: Light-bodied, crisp and dry with prickly carbonation
Aftertaste: Spice and doughy white bread mingle with pine and herbal hop notes
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Light Lager
items.desc:
Effortlessly drinkable, refined refreshment
Our Light Lager is brewed with a small proportion of rice to lighten the colour, flavour, and body, leaving you with a refined beer that’s easy drinking. Perfect for times that require maximum refreshment or considered moderation.
3.5% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Backbone of subtle malt sweetness and a light lemony hop character, rounded off by a touch of herbal bitterness
Body: Light-bodied, crisp and dry
Aftertaste: Lasting notes of sweet grain alongside faint herbal hop notes
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY RICE

items.name: Never Before/Again
items.summary: A Blended Sour w/ Yuzu & Salt
items.desc:
A blend of one, two and three-year aged sour ales with yuzu and salt.
Made in homage to the legendary Oude Geuze of Pajottenland, this beer combined young and old spontaneous barrels with Foudre du Haut, before
being given a cocktail-inspired twist.
Best paired with a reflection on this very moment, that has never happened before, and will never happen again.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
6.2% ABV 750ml bottle

items.name: Night On The Files
items.desc:
Shut your work off for the day – sign out, close it all down, and scrap any plans you had for a night on the files – instead, savour this DIPA, and imagine how amazingly ridiculous the world would be if all dogs had painted nails.
This deliciously juicy and full-flavoured beer is an update on one of our old favourites from early this year, The Light Grey One.
As a way of saying thanks to our loyal customers, we gave them the chance to vote on what beers from the first half of 2020 they'd like to see return before the end of the year. This is the first in the series of re-brews, making just a slight tweak on the original recipe.
8% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Only A Dream Can Kill A Dream
items.summary: Fresh, Funky Barrel-fermented Pale with Tropical Fruits
items.desc:
Fresh, Funky Pale Ale full of tropical fruit salad flavours.
Racked onto the remaining lees in first-use French natural red wine barrels, this Pale first developed delicate funky notes and a refreshing, dry finish. Refermentation on passion fruit, pineapple and mango created a succulent, yet zippy, tropical punch bowl of flavours. Waking up from 400 years of slumber, we can summon the energy of a great man, that had a great dream. Best served chilled, and following a period of service to others less privileged.
﻿Store Cold
ALC 5.9% VOL 750ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Pale Ale
items.desc:
Our Pale Ale is a beer for everyday moments, whether it's conversation with friends or quiet relaxation after work, and aims to provide balance between bold flavour and easy drinkability. It's full of rounded tropical fruit flavours with a soft, juicy finish and low bitterness.
3.7% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Mango, pineapple and tangerine, with a light, lasting malt character
Body: Light to medium body with spritzy carbonation
Aftertaste: Soft and juicy orange, low bitterness
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
Want a discounted 6 pack? Click here

items.name: Statement of Intent
items.summary: Collab w/ The Queer Brewing Project
items.desc:
A collaboration with The Queer Brewing Project, this lower-ABV wheat beer is our tribute to a modern American classic and much-loved Witbier. Balancing the bold flavours of coriander seed and curaçao orange peel with the drinkability of a table beer.
This collaboration was brewed as part of Queer Brewing founder Lily Waite’s residency at Cloudwater under the new Wayfinder project, and to mark the beginning of the next phase of Queer Brewing.
3.5% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: The Details of Mortality
items.desc:
A blend of pale ales aged in red and white wine barrels for two years. Bright citrus and spritzy Brett complexity.
Best paired with a reflection on the infinite, boundless energy that is part of every being.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
4.9% ABV, 375ml

items.name: The Passing of Time
items.desc:
This beer is a raspberry, peach and lavender sour ale, blended from a mix of red and white wine barrels and foudre-aged beer. Bright and radiant.
Best paired with recalling a time of pure, unadulterated bliss.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
5.8% ABV, 750ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: The Windows Were Golden
items.desc:
In the early morning light, houses nestled in the hills around Little Kaiteriteri Beach glow bright gold.
A short drive north of Riwaka, both a place in New Zealand’s south island and the name of the fragrant hop featured in this single-hopped Pale Ale, waves gently broke on Kaiteriteri’s shores, as if they too were lapping up the early morning peace and quiet.
4% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Tilt Your Head Back And Relax
items.desc:
DDH Double Dank IPA.
Showcasing a blend of our dankest modern hops.
The trees may be blushing at our inaction over the climate emergency, but we’d rather fancy they are showing off once more before their winter’s rest, after a challenging and trying year. Take all of the richness of Autumn in, it’s colourful sights, wind-driven sounds, and rich smells.
6% ABV, 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Tufts Of Twine In Upper Moutere
items.desc:
When the last of the hops are harvested, the cables that held the weight of many hop bines are left punctuated by tufts of twine. Pilsner is a style that provides space to showcase hop varietals that are subtle in character, and is a perfect choice for punctuating more assertive beers, with its bright, light, refreshing qualities.
4.6% ABV, 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Herbal notes, a squeeze of fresh lemon and ripe red apple, underpinned by a cracker malt base
Body: Light and clean, with a crisp, dry finish
Aftertaste: Crushed black pepper and herbal notes, fresh white bread, light pithy bitterness
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Within Reach
items.desc:
Aged in foudre for nine months, and then refermented on passion fruit, raspberry and mango. Refreshing, dry, and spritzy with an underlying Brett presence, and a full fruit expression.
Best paired with a reflection on your deepest most needs - everything
may already be within reach.
Made with time and love at Cloudwater.
10.7% ABV, 750ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
